description: For those gamers who love a bit of busywork, the Summer Sims 2 Humble Bundle has some popular simulation games available.
title: Get a bunch of different simulators in the Summer Sims 2 Humble Bundle

description: While it's in need of a better name, the RPG Maker MV / MZ for Linux tool had a new release recently that expanded the support for running games on Linux from TyranoBuilder, and RPG Maker XP / VX / VX Ace.
title: RPG Maker MV / MZ for Linux tool now supports TyranoBuilder, RPG Maker XP / VX / VX Ace

description: PCSX2 is a popular open source emulation for the Sony PlayStation 2 (PS2) and PCSX2 version 2.0 is now officially available with a great many changes and improvements.
title: PS2 Emulator PCSX2 2.0 is out now and it's a huge upgrade

description: Well this is certainly an interesting one. Gotcha Gotcha Games known for the RPG Maker series and Pixel Game Maker have announced Action Game Maker and it's being made with the open source Godot Engine.
title: RPG Maker / Pixel Game Maker devs move to Godot for Action Game Maker

description: Video recording and livestreaming tool OBS Studio version 30.2 is officially out now, bringing with it various new features and a nice few Linux improvements too.
title: OBS Studio 30.2 is out now with native NVENC encode for Linux, shared texture support
